body_html:
Are you following the instructions outlined in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android ?

That suggests the use of bazel build to build the demo, and has some instructions for using Android Studio as well. Are you following those?

If you're using a custom setup, then perhaps you want to add some more detail on your setup and post your question on stackoverflow?
body_text:
Are you following the instructions outlined in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android ?
That suggests the use of bazel build to build the demo, and has some instructions for using Android Studio as well. Are you following those?
If you're using a custom setup, then perhaps you want to add some more detail on your setup and post your question on stackoverflow?
body:
Are you following the instructions outlined in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android ?

That suggests the use of `bazel build` to build the demo, and has some instructions for using Android Studio as well. Are you following those?

If you're using a custom setup, then perhaps you want to add some more detail on your setup and post your question on stackoverflow?
